titleStmt.title: Justice restored or, a guid for His Majestie's justices of peace, both in sessions, and out of sessions; according to the antient laws of the kingdom.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, amended, and enlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Th. Roycroft, for H. Twyford, T. Dring, and J. Place,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "January. 1660"; the second 1 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
